However  I Was A Little Concerned When It Was Suggested That Commercial Tools To Enable Independent Hotels To Locate And Effectively Manage Their Online Reputation Cost 10 000+. I Appreciate That Figure Was Intended To Be An Upper Limit But The Impression Given Was That Commercial Tools Are Too Expensive For This Sector  Which Is Simply Not The Case.   I DidnT Voice This During The Session  As It Would Have Been Inappropriate To Start A Discussion That Would Have Inevitably Led To Me Mentioning Revinate. However  I Do Feel The Panel Could Have Pointed Out That Tools Are Available For Approximately 170 Per Month. RevinateS 23 000+ Clients Include The HiltonS Worldwide  Four Seasons  Ihg And Bdl  So Our Platform Is Tried  Tested And Trusted. IM Sure You Agree That Too Frequently Independent Hotels Struggle To Fund The Same Technology As Used By The Big Boys. However In This Area  Where Arguably Independent Hotels Are More Vulnerable To Negative Ugc  They Can!   I Strongly Feel It Appropriate And Beneficial For The Audience To Be Made Aware That High Quality Tools At An Affordable Price Do Exist.   Indeed At The Wtm  "Next Generation Guest Satisfaction" Session Was Sponsored By Tripadvisor & Revinate. The Session Was Extremely Well Receive As Tripadvisor Talked About How To Improve A Hotel's Ranking And We (Revinate) Showed Them The Inexpensive Tools Available To Enable Them To Do So. Consequently  There Is No Reason For Any Hotel Not To Effectively Manage Their Online Reputation!  Perhaps You Might Consider Expanding The Guest Panel Next Year To Include A Platform Provider.
